availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Vincent B. Simpson (Caldwell co., ky, farmer and physician )

body.p: Caldwell County, Kentucky, farmer and physician. Missouri native. Married to Sarah Simpson. Father of George Ann Simpson, Elizabeth "Betty" Simpson, William F. Simpson, Thomas A. Simpson, John Simpson, and Mariah Simpson. Farmer in Caldwell County, Kentucky, in 1850. Physician in Farmersville in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Caldwell County, District 2, p. 253A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Caldwell County, Farmersville, p. 144.
